gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 118, Clippers 108
gameRecap.excerpt: The Cavaliers defeated the Clippers, 118-108. Donovan Mitchell recorded 28 points, 12 assists, and four rebounds for the Cavaliers, with Jarrett Allen adding 20 points and 17 rebounds in the victory. Kawhi Leonard tallied 30 points, eight rebounds, and three assists for the Clippers in the losing effort. The Cavaliers improve to 28-16, while the Clippers fall to 30-15.
